mapper.sql: file_id, disp_name, file_name, file_path, proj_id, rel_doc_id, last_update_user, last_download_user, updated_time, keyword, status, remark
mapper.insert:
insert into file_info
file_id,
disp_name,
file_name,
file_path,
proj_id,
rel_doc_id,
last_update_user,
last_download_user,
updated_time,
keyword,
status,
remark,

mapper.update:
update file_info
disp_name = #{dispName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proj_id = #{projId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rel_doc_id = #{relDocId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_download_user = #{lastDownloadUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update file_info set disp_name = #{dispName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proj_id = #{projId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rel_doc_id = #{relDocId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_download_user = #{lastDownloadUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM file_info WHERE file_name = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATUS=0 AND rel_doc_id= #{partnerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER};
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM file_info AS f WHERE f.`rel_doc_id`=#{partnerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND f.`file_name`= #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
SELECT file_info.`file_id`,file_info.`updated_time` FROM file_info ORDER BY file_info.`file_id` DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM file_info AS a WHERE a.file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.update: UPDATE file_info AS a SET a.`rel_doc_id`=#{partnerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},a.`last_update_user`=#{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE a.`file_id`=#{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.select: SELECT a.`file_path` FROM file_info AS a WHERE a.`file_name` = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.`status`=0
SELECT a.`file_name` FROM file_info AS a WHERE a.`rel_doc_id`=#{partnerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND STATUS=0;
SELECT a.`file_id` FROM file_info AS a WHERE a.`rel_doc_id`=#{partnerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND STATUS=0;
SELECT a.`file_id` FROM file_info AS a WHERE a.`file_name`=#{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
mapper.update: UPDATE file_info AS a SET a.`status`=1 WHERE a.`file_id`=#{fileNo,jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.select: SELECT STATUS FROM file_info WHERE file_name=#{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND rel_doc_id=#{partnerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER};
